product_name: Keen Rivington Mary Jane CNX Shoes - Girls'
long_description: The girls' Keen Rivington Mary Jane CNX shoes feature a mix of colors and patterns for one-of-a-kind style she'll love to show off. Canvas uppers are soft and durable; stretchy instep strap ensures a secure fit. Patented rubber Toe Guards protect feet from scuffs and bumps. Removable polyurethane footbeds act as the midsoles to provide cushioning and comfort for all-day wear. Low-profile, nonmarking natural rubber outsoles on the girls' Keen Rivington Mary Jane CNX shoes supply all-around traction. Closeout.
short_description: The girls' Keen Rivington Mary Jane CNX shoes feature a mix of colors and patterns for one-of-a-kind style she'll love to show off.
